system.description:
Your touch drains life force from enemies and transfers it to heal your wounds. You deal necrotic damage and regain hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

Scaling: At dice count 3, heal for full damage dealt. At dice count 6, can steal temporary hit points. At dice count 9, drains multiple attributes. At dice count 12, can work at range. At dice count 15, can drain permanent life force.
